about.title0: Join one club with the top experts
about.text0: On Addspire you can ask, discuss and answer questions, and anyone can join the discussion.
about.text1: In the clubs, you connect with the top experts and based on the reputation and answers you can choose the best one for your needs.
about.text2: As an expert or business, you have a great chance to show your expertise, customer care and build a reputation by giving top answers.
about.text3: Anyone who makes contributions in a club in the form of valuable questions, answers and comments can earn coins distributed by Addspire or rewarded as bonuses.

clubRules.title: Club rules
clubRules.text0: Create club: Anyone can create and join a club on Addspire. All clubs are public and the knowledge is available to everyone.
clubRules.text1: Experts and active clubs: The creator of a club becomes the first expert of this club. Clubs can have up to 8 experts and it becomes active when there are at least 3 experts. This rule does not apply to new clubs during the first 14 days after their creation.
clubRules.text2: Rights and ban: All experts of a club have the same rights: edit the club, edit and delete questions, answers and comments, add experts and ban users.
clubRules.text3: Delete experts: experts cannot delete other experts from the club. This is why we recommend you to create clubs only with people you know and trust.
clubRules.text4: Club rules on Addspire - Q&A clubs with experts, reputation, and coins

coinsRules.title: Addspire coins
coinsRules.allCoins: There are 100 000 000 Addspire coins out there on Addspire.
coinsRules.text0: You can earn Addspire coins for making valuable contributions by asking questions, giving answers and adding comments.
coinsRules.text1: There are two sources of coins: Addspire distribution and bonuses.
coinsRules.head: Coins rules on Addspire - Q&A clubs with experts, reputation, and coins

addspire.title: Addspire distribution:
addspire.text0: Distribution plan: Everyday Addspire distributes a part of the coins among users until all coins are distributed. The distribution will ramp up from 8 000 to 80 000 coins a day during the next 4 years.
addspire.text1: Distribution steps: First the total daily distributed coins are divided among questions depending on how popular each question is. Then, the coins in each question are divided among users who have contributed depending on the reputation of their content.

bonus.title: Bonuses:
bonus.text0: Bonus inspires: Users can encourage other users to answer their questions by adding a bonus. A bonus is a number of coins that the author of a question will distribute among contributors when an answer is accepted or in 7 days after the bonus was added.
bonus.text1: Accepted answer: If there is an accepted answer to a question, 50% of the bonus will be transferred to the author of the accepted answer.
bonus.text2: Distribution: The remaining coins are distributed among users who have contributed to the content depending on the reputation of their content.

coinsRules.notice: Please note, that the coins used in Addspire are an internal currency only. The coins cannot be withdrawn, deposited, bought or sold.

reputationRules.title: Reputation rules
reputationRules.text0: Every member of a club has a reputation and it immediately shows how much contribution the user has made and how much the user is an expert in this club.
reputationRules.text1: Role of reputation: Users with a higher reputation have more rights and credibility. For example, in some clubs, only users with a certain reputation can start conversations.
reputationRules.text2: Growing reputation: You can earn a reputation by asking good questions, giving valuable answers and adding valuable comments.
reputationRules.text3: Votes: Anyone can vote up or down a question, answer or comment and this will add to the reputation of the author.
reputationRules.text4: Accepted answer: If your answer is the best, the author of the question can choose your answer as accepted. Only one answer can be accepted.
reputationRules.text6: There is a limit to how many times each member of a club can vote.
reputationRules.text7: Members with a higher reputation can vote more:
reputationRules.text8: Negative reputation: Users with a negative reputation cannot vote or create content in the club. Every day 5 will be added to their reputation until it becomes 0 again.
reputationRules.text9: Banned users: Users who do not follow the rules of a club can be banned by experts of the club. Banned members are not allowed to add content or vote in the club.

head.title: Addspire - Q&A clubs with experts, reputation, and coins
head.description: On Addspire you can discuss and answer questions and anyone can join the discussion. In a club you connect with the top experts and you can choose the best contractor or business based on the reputation and answers. As an expert or business you have a great chance to show your expertise, customer care and build reputation by giving top answers. Anyone who makes contributions in a club in the form of valuable questions, answers and comments can earn coins distributed by Addspire or rewarded as a bonus.
